equipment.name: YOSUDA Pro Cardio Climber Stepping Elliptical Machine, 3 in 1 Elliptical, Total Body Fitness Cross Trainer with Hyper-Quiet Magnetic Drive System, 16 Resistance Levels, LCD Monitor & iPad Mount
equipment.description: YOSUDA elliptical stepper combines the easy, low-impact motion of an Elliptical, and the cardiorespiratory improving power of a Stepper, with calorie burning power of a Treadmill. Extended vertical and horizontal stride length produces a fluid climbing motion aimed to engage your whole body.

equipment.name: MaxiClimber Vertical Climber Combines Resistance Training and High-Intensity Cardio for a Full Body Workout. Free Coach-led Classes & Fitness App
equipment.description: Versatile and easy-to-use climber that works for all fitness levels, with BONUS companion Fitness App.

equipment.name: Marcy Foldable Upright Exercise Bike with Adjustable Resistance for Cardio Workout & Strength Training - Multiple Styles Available
equipment.description: The fat-blasting cardio offered by this exercise device is significant, as each pedal targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes. Not only does it burn fat, but it also strengthens the leg?s muscles, giving you well-toned legs

equipment.name: Sunny Health & Fitness Legacy Stepping Elliptical Machine, Total Body Cross Trainer with Hyper-Quiet Magnetic Belt Drive, Low Impact Exercise Equipment, Optional Bluetooth with Exclusive SunnyFit App

equipment.name: SereneLife Folding Treadmill - Foldable Home Fitness Equipment with LCD for Walking & Running - Cardio Exercise Machine - Preset and Adjustable Programs - Bluetooth Connectivity
equipment.description: Our treadmill with incline has a hydraulic folding system for easy storage. When folded, it has a total dimension of just 21.65 L x 24.4 W x 46.4 H inches..Rated Voltage: 120V/60HZ, Adjustable Timer Setting: 5 - 99 Minutes.

equipment.description: Top Choice of Physical Therapists: The Original Stretch Out Strap, made in the USA, with instructional exercise book and mobile app featuring video demonstrations. The first stretching strap on the market in 1993, still recommended by professionals today.

equipment.name: Gradient Fitness Stretching Strap for Physical Therapy
equipment.description: Measuring 8 feet long, 1.5 inches wide, 12 independent stretching loops, ultra-soft neoprene padded handles. Proven to be durable and long-lasting. The best stretch out strap!

equipment.name: Trideer Yoga Ball - Exercise Ball for Workout pilates Stability - Anti-Burst and Slip Resistant for physical therapy, Birthing, Stretching & Core Workout, Office Ball Chair, Flexible Seating, Home Gym
equipment.description: Promotes Health at Work - Trideer yoga ball can help to alleviate your chronic back pain, sciatica, and glute aches from too much sitting by strengthening your core muscles that support your spine and promoting micro movements.

equipment.name: Joyenergy Foam Roller for Deep Tissue Massager for Muscle and Myofascial Trigger Point Release
equipment.description: Muscle stretches and massages can be performed before and after fitness, exercise, and reduce stiffness. Relieve muscle soreness and tension, Penetrates deep into body muscles to quickly release myofascia, Improve muscle flexibility.

equipment.name: Chirp Wheel Foam Roller - Targeted Muscle Roller for Deep Tissue Massage, Back Stretcher with Foam Padding, Supports Back Pain Relief
equipment.description: Chirp Wheel+ is designed with trigger points in mind to break up tight muscle fibers and hard-to-reach parts in your back instead of putting undue pressure on your spine, so you can focus on deeper stretches without worries. Our 6" wheel back stretcher gives deep tissue massage and specifically targets the area in contact with the muscles at any given point providing a satisfying amount of pressure in general.

equipment.name: Home Gym Multifunctional Full Body Home Gym
equipment.description:
About this item
【Professional】More than 20 years of professional fitness equipment production experience, carefully designed by professionals. This is a satisfying and durable home gym.
【High Quality Thick Steel】The frame and weight guards of the whole set of equipment are made of thick steel. Don't be afraid of any weight challenge!
【New design】 Leg exercise pedal can exercise more leg muscle groups, more functions than the same type of fitness equipment.
【Professional service】No matter how long it takes, we will perfectly solve the problems you encounter in use. Always at your service.
【Easy Installation】The detailed installation instructions and the installation tutorial video with clear steps help you to easily complete the assembly within half an hour. (The screws and nuts are numbered and placed in order)

equipment.name: Schwinn Fitness Indoor Cycling Exercise Bike Series
equipment.description:
Try our JRNY Mobile-Only Membership for 2 months.
Workout at home or on the go with inspiring trainers, and just-for-you adaptive workouts, from your phone or tablet

Designed to work with popular cycling apps such as Peloton and Zwift (Separate subscriptions required)
Magnetic resistance with 100 micro-adjustable resistance levels
Dual-sided pedals (SPD clips | Toe Cages)
Adjustable race-style seat

equipment.name: Sunny Health & Fitness Water Rowing Machine, Indoor Exercise Water Rower Plus Optional Bluetooth Connectivity with SunnyFit® App and Wooden Smart Foldable
equipment.description:
About this item
SMART FITNESS: Row along with Sunny Health & Fitness expert trainers on the Sunny Health & Fitness SunnyFit APP. Connect your preferred mobile device through Bluetooth and view your performance metrics in real time.
SUNNYFIT App: Elevate your fitness journey with SunnyFit app & explore 1000+ workout videos on demand. Engage with expert trainers to receive personalized guidance, and customized workouts. Share, compete for leaderboard and much more.
WATER PERFORMANCE: Row on the water in the comfort of your home. The water creates a smooth and steady rowing experience with every stroke. Instant resistance is available with the flywheel and 16 fan blades. The faster the fan blades spin the higher resistance and dynamic response caused by the harmonious interaction with the water, giving the user a unique experience.
DESIGN: Constructed with LIGHTWEIGHT sturdy steel, for solid performance and durability. The 16 Hydro Blades mimic the dynamic movements of competitive rowing. Non- slip HD Handlebar is sweat-resistant and wide enough to accommodate different hand widths. A tear-resistant mesh belt withstands the stress of repeated pulling. Keep the rower sturdy and level with the adjustable leveling end caps.
ERGO-EFFICIENT: Molded padded seat is designed to be comfortable and functional. The high-profile seat design is 17 inches from the ground, which allows user to get on and off the seat without bending and straining you back. Non-slip foot pedals with durable nylon Velcro straps keep feet secure. Footpads pivot to allow more freedom of the foot and ankle to ensure optimal rowing mechanics.

equipment.name: Stick Mobility 3 Stick Training Bundle | Improve Flexibility, Mobility, and Strength with Active Stretching for Golf, Running, Fitness, Pickleball, and More
equipment.description:
NIQUE FLEXIBLE STICKS: The Stick Mobility Training Stick is comprised of a special synthetic material designed to be flexible and strong to create resistance, tension, leverage, stability, and body awareness.
VIDEO LIBRARY OF EXERCISES AND WORKOUTS: Get unlimited access to 100’s of exercises and workouts so you can get the most benefit out of your sticks.
BEGINNERS TO ADVANCED TRAINING: Used by everyone from people just getting started to professional athletes and everyone in between. This is a complete system for joint mobilization, strength training, and deep fascial stretching to increase athletic performance, reduce the risk of injury, and speed recovery.
TOTAL BODY MOBILITY SYSTEM: The Stick Mobility Training Bundle comes equipped with everything you need to improve your flexibility, joint strength and stability, and overall body mobility. It's a complete mobility training system.
USE ANYWHERE:  Designed for professional use in gyms, medical facilities, and on the sports field. They can be used outdoors, are 100% waterproof, and are easy to clean.
